title: Blouse, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk on silk
Technique: embroidered in chain stitch (tambour) on plain weave
description: Silk blouse with short sleeves and embroidered cuffs. Embroidered at neck edge and in three bands at bottom.

Blouse, 19th century. Medium: silk on silk
